description: This file contains utility functions related to filtering and sorting products in an e-commerce platform. It includes functions to parse multi-select query parameters, apply multiple filters to product lists, sort products based on different criteria, and count products by various facets.

methods.name: parseMulti(qs, key)
methods.description: Reads multi-select query parameters supporting both repeated keys (?k=a&k=b) and comma-separated single values (?k=a,b). Returns an array of strings.

methods.name: applyFilters(products, selected)
methods.description: Filters a list of products based on selected filter criteria such as families, sizes, collections, colors, badges, and price ranges.

methods.name: sortProducts(list, sortKey)
methods.description: Sorts a list of products based on specified sort key like price ascending/descending, newest, or best seller.

methods.name: countByFacet(products, facets)
methods.description: Counts the number of products for each category within facets such as families, sizes, collections, colors, price ranges, and badges.
